title: British Gas fleet to go all-electric by 2025
lead: The company brought forward the target five years earlier than originally planned

title: Wind turbine giant Vestas announces 300 layoffs
lead: The manufacturer decided to consolidate three factories in Colorado

title: Peterborough greenlights solar park at former landfill site
lead: The 2.9MW project is forecast to generate enough energy to power 700 homes

title: Equinor plans shut down of Veslefrikk field after 30 years
lead: Discovered in 1981, the field came on stream in 1989 and has produced more than 400m barrels of oil equivalent

title: EIB backs plant proteins and green chemistry with €50m loan
lead: Funding will support the production of proteins for animal feed from oilseeds

title: Grants, subsidies and incentives for commercial electric fleets
lead: Thinking about going electric? We don’t blame you. Electric vehicles (EVs) are the future of driving and key to a zero-carbon future.

title: Steel transport on veggie oil gets on UK rail track
lead: The train transported 2,500 tonnes of steel product from Wales to West Midlands

title: French battery firm granted €50m from EU bank to support growth
lead: The loan will finance the strategic development of the company through the expansion of its range of products for 100% battery-powered, hydrogen hybrid and thermal hybrid vehicles

title: Australia backs first waste-to-hydrogen plant
lead: The project will demonstrate the use of purified hydrogen to power a fuel cell vehicle

title: Slovakia referred to EU Court over poor air quality
lead: According to the Commission, the air quality measures presented by Slovakia have not proven to be timely and effective to reduce pollution within the agreed limits
